rule.description: For all annotation dictionaries containing an AP key, the appearance dictionary that it defines as its value shall contain only the N key. If an annotation dictionaryâ€™s Subtype key has a value of Widget and its FT key has a value of Btn, the value of the N key shall be an appearance subdictionary; otherwise the value of the N key shall be an appearance stream.

error.message: Annotation's appearance dictionary contains entries other than N or the N entry has an invalid type
